blank.description: Opens the URL address using [_blank] property (under new tab or window).

url.description: The URL address to navigate to.

description: Load a new web page in the current browser window. This is done using an HTTP GET operation and the method will block until the load is complete. this action supports locators, elements, attributes, macros and regular expressions.

examples.description: Navigate to [https://gravitymvctestapplication.azurewebsites.net/uicontrols/[ using [_blank] operation (new tab or window).
Gets the [text] content of the element found by the given locator and pass it as [URL] to the current browser.
Gets the [text] content of the element found by the given locator and pass it as [URL] to a new browser tab or window.
Gets the [href] attribute value of the element found by the given locator and pass it as [URL] to the current browser.
examples.literalExample: go to url take {//li[5]/a} element from {href} attribute

examples.description: Gets the first match from the element [href] attribute value, found by the given locator, filtered by the given pattern and pass it as [URL] to the current browser.
examples.literalExample: go to url on {url_div_text} using {id} filter {http.*$}

name: GoToUrl

properties.onElement: The locator value by which the element will be found.
properties.locator: The locator type by which the element will be found.
properties.onAttribute: The element attribute from which to extract information for action execution. If not specified, information will be taken from the element inner text.
properties.regularExpression: A pattern by which the extracted information will be evaluated. Returns the first match.
properties.argument: The URL to load. It is best to use a fully qualified URL.

summary: Load a new web page in the current browser window.
